scripts.css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/main.scss dist/css/main.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/reboot.scss dist/css/reboot.css
scripts.css-minify: cleancss --level 1 --format breaksWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/main.min.css dist/css/main.css && cleancss --level 1 --format breaksWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/reboot.min.css dist/css/reboot.css
scripts.css-copy: shx mkdir -p catalog/static/dist/ && shx cp -r dist/css/ catalog/static/dist/
